[On Use] Set all enemies' [Virbrate] stack to 4
This card can be used at most use once per 4 Scene
[On Use] Inflict 2 [Burn] to self

[On Hit] Gain 3 Negative Emotion Coins

[On Hit] Inflict 2 Burn

[On Use] Reduce self's Burn stack by 5

[On Hit] Inflict 3 Burn
[On Play] For the duration of the Scene, all dice gain 1 Power.

Can only target on Fresh Meat
At the start of each Scene set cost of this card to current Light
[On Hit] Recover 20 HP; If Target is Fresh Meat, Kill target.
